title: Firefox tarayıcısında oturum bilgilerinin sistem yeniden başlatıldığında silinmesi
content: Firefox tarayıcısını standart modda kullanmama rağmen, bilgisayarımı kapatıp açtığımda giriş yaptığım web sitelerindeki oturumlarım (Google, Microsoft, LLM web siteleri ve geri kalan tüm giriş bilgileri) sona ermiş oluyor. Tarayıcı ayarlarında "geçmişi temizle" özelliğini kapattım, çerezler standart izlemede, Firefox kapanınca çerezleri temizle özelliği kapalı ve gizli mod kullanmıyorum. Tüm ayarların üstünden geçtim. Bu durum çerezlerin sistem kapanışıyla birlikte silinmesine neden oluyor gibi görünüyor fakat aynı zamanda ayarlarda çerezler ve ön bellek 1.4gb yer kaplıyor. Bu davranış varsayılan bir özellikse değiştirilmesini; bir hata ise düzeltilmesini rica ederim.
creator: ggdl

title: Cannot uninstall PWA created in Firefox 143.0.1 on Windows 11
content: I'm not able to uninstall PWA apps created in Firefox 143.0.1 using Windows 11 usual uninstalling procedure. If i click "uninstall" in Windows Start Menu the app remains installed. PWA apps created with Firefox do not show on Windows 11 installed apps list so I cannot uninstall them. I haven't found any guide on the web on how to uninstall PWA created from Firefox. So, how can I effectively uninstall those PWA apps? Thank you in advance for your kind answer. Regards.
creator: amschiar

title: Firefox Not Showing Pages in Search
content: This is a subtle problem. I used to be able to have pages listed in my search history. Now I can only have a search for that page listed. So I have to click on the search result in "Search Facebook" on desktop, click the search for the page in the search history and then click the page in the search results to get to the page. I don't have to do this for groups. Pages have a magnifying glass beside them which they never had before. When I click on any of these, I just get a list of results of searches for posts related to these pages, not the page itself. If I click a group, I go straight to the group with no list of posts. I logged out, cleared the cache and cookie but that didn't solve the issue.
creator: eugbug1

title: Facebook Not Showing Pages in Search
content: This is a subtle problem. I used to be able to have pages listed in my search history. Now I can only have a search for that page listed. So I have to click on the search result in "Search Facebook" on desktop, click the search for the page in the search history and then click the page in the search results to get to the page. I don't have to do this for groups. Pages have a magnifying glass beside them which they never had before. When I click on any of these, I just get a list of results of searches for posts related to these pages, not the page itself. If I click a group, I go straight to the group with no list of posts. I logged out, cleared the cache and cookie but that didn't solve the issue.
